issue.title: [JS] Test fuzzer inputs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5928](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5928). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We are developing a fuzzer-based corpus of malformed IPC inputs

https://github.com/apache/arrow-testing/tree/master/data/arrow-ipc

The JavaScript implementation should also test against these to verify that the correct kind of exception is raised
